body_html:
For the dataloader, I will test it later to ensure it generating the same data.
I found that if I use algorithm-sgd without moment the results can be exact same in the first 10 epochs and will change slightly after 10 epochs for restart trainings.
If I can compile my model into some binary forms, I can provide my model to you for debugging.

body:
For the dataloader, I will test it later to ensure it generating the same data.
I found that if I use algorithm-sgd without moment the results can be exact same in the first 10 epochs and will change slightly after 10 epochs for restart trainings.
If I can compile my model into some binary forms, I can provide my model to you for debugging.
